name: Celtic - Manannan mac Lir

relationships.enemies: The Fomorians, those who would invade or desecrate the sacred isles, oath-breakers and those who abuse hospitality
relationships.allies: TheTuatha D√© Danann(especiallyLughand theDagda), sailors and fishermen who honor him, those who approach the Otherworld with respect

family.parents: Lir (the sea personified) - his name "mac Lir" means "son of the sea"
family.siblings: In some traditions, brother of √Åed and other children of Lir (connected to the Children of Lir tale)
family.children: Mong√°n mac Fiachna (foster-son and possibly biological son through magical intervention), Niamh of the Golden Hair (in some traditions)

description: Lord of the Waves, Guardian of the Gates Between Worlds, and Keeper of the Mists. Manannan mac Lir rules the seas surrounding Ireland and the blessed isles beyond the horizon. He is a shapeshifter, trickster, and psychopomp who ferries souls to the Otherworld, commands the ocean's treasures, and guards the boundaries between the mortal realm and the realm of the gods.

archetype.name: üåä SEA GOD / OTHERWORLD GUARDIAN
archetype.description: Manannan embodies the Sea God archetype - ruler of ocean depths and psychopomp to the Otherworld.

subtitle: God of the Sea and the Otherworld
